title: Will Trump’s Presidency End on the Day of a Comet, Meteor Shower, and Total Eclipse?
subtitle: It is unlikely that U.S. viewers will be able to capture a glimpse of all three sky events.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The current term of U.S. President Donald Trump will end when the Electoral College votes on Dec. 14, 2020, a day marked in some parts of the world that coincided with a comet, meteor shower, and total eclipse of the sun.
